descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69917-0-1442921164.jpg[/img]


[size=3]This mod adds a female follower.
This is standalone. So you can use this with no problem whatever body types you're using.[/size]


[size=3][b][Follower detail][/b][/size]


[size=3]Name: Liella
Level: 10 - No limit
Voice: Young Eager (Vanilla)
Body: UNP
Location: Dragonsreach, Whiterun
Combat Style: Water magic (the custom magic by reaperix)
Perks:
Light Foot, Novice Destruction, Apprentice Destruction
Expert Destruction, Master Destruction, Face Light
ETC: Essential and marriable[/size]


[size=3][b][Recommended Mods]

[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url] (I recommend an optional file too)


[b][size=3][Change Log][/size][/b]


[size=3]v1.2 adds the Facelight perk

v1.1 modifies Dragonsreach's name correctly[/size]


[b][size=3][Credit][/size][/b]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit by tktk[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female by dimon99[/url]

The Female Texture by Gonzo

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr. Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65146]JEDI-SITH ARMORED CLOTHES by Alduin78 and Zzjay[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66919]Water Destruction Magic by reaperix[/url][/center][center][/center][center] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk1[/url]
